abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Railway Project will consist
            essentially of: (a) track and buildings: (i) equipment for
            and renewal of 21.5 km of track; (ii) ballasting of 210 km
            of line; (iii) joint welding of 380 km of rails; and (iv)
            minor repairs to bridges; (b) motive power and rolling
            stock: 4 main line locomotives; 5 shunting locomotives; 2
            railcars; 8 trailers; 4 passenger coaches; 125 freight cars
            and spare parts for rolling stock; and (c) management:
            equipment for accounts/statistics, consulting services and training.
